turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can I assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm trying to get some specialty pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I asked an order for four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, we want one the Grandma Special. We want one of those with the Romano cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. On all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just send them one. Just on the Grandma Special.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does it have Romano or cheese on my Grandma's Special?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, let's get Chicken Pie pizza as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As well as a pizza with at the six Cheese Bread pizza and let's get a pizza with onions tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gluten-free.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So 4 large pizzas. A Grandma Special with Romano Cheese, a Chicken Pot Pie pizza, a 6 blend cheese and the last one has onions, tomatoes and pepperoni. Gluten-free crusts. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Yeah, that's verified.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your total is $59.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Sounds good to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bella Luna's soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: More like 45 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Yeah, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye now!
